snippet.title: THE COMPANION | Game Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1392780/The_Companion/

A cinematic gaming experience.  Play as a Spirit Animal on a quest of purpose and fate. Explore a magical and beautiful world where visions of a past, present, and future, guide you. Collect Essence and find Artifacts that aid in building a link to the corporeal world. 

This is a single player narrative. It is a story of mystery, intrigue, and adventure. Journey across seven beautiful landscapes and witness the emotional story of a family as they tackle the challenges ahead of them. One step at a time, together.

http://www.thecompaniongame.com
https://twitter.com/AtStudio46
https://www.instagram.com/atstudio46/

Music:
"We've Come So Far", Robert Shirey Kelly, 100% Clearance through Musicbed
